title: PRETTY GIRLS
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Yeah, I like pretty girls
Pretty girls just like me, oh
All of them 'round the world
Living in ecstasy, oh
'Cause pretty girls da-don't, don't cry (Yah)
[Verse 1]
Said, I like pretty girls and
Pretty girls just like me, oh
Uh-huh, and pretty girls get front row
And pretty girls get my tees, yeah
Feelin' like a Barbie girl
I just need a light pink Beamer
Turn heads with the legs on shimmer
Gimme plenty lettuce and a waist on slimmer
Pretty big boys give me pretty big dinner
Kick it with the wettest, I'm a pretty good swimmer
All that pretty pussy, that's a pretty big litter
He wanna get down with my pretty little get up, get up
And this pretty girl too hot and fly, alright
[Chorus]
Yeah, I like pretty girls
Pretty girls just like me, oh
All of them 'round the world
Living in ecstasy, oh
'Cause pretty girls da-don't, don't cry

[Verse 2]
Yuh, yuh, yuh, yuh, yuh, yuh
Pretty girls, get your li-ife
Without them I would die-ie
They don't complain or cry
Apple-bottom of his eye
Thicky them, thicky them thighs
Bitch, I ain't Minnie, no Mickey's, no mice
She don't do hickeys, throw fitties, no fights
Proud like Penny, no Henny, just wine
